status.title: mina's current settings
status.description: hey there! let's take a peek at your current settings! i'm so excited to show you what we've got set up!
status.footer: remember, i'm always here to help you set things up! don't be shy to ask!

staffRole.alreadyAdded: {role} is already a staff role. you can't add it twice!
staffRole.maxReached: whoa there! you already have 5 staff roles. please remove one before adding another.
staffRole.notFound: {role} is not a staff role. are you sure you selected the right role?

updateChannel.noPermission: i don't have permission to send messages in {channel}. please give me that permission.

hub.title: roles management hub
hub.description:
welcome to the mina roles management hub! choose an operation below to get started.

**cleanup** - bulk delete roles by various criteria
**create role** - create a new role
**autorole** - manage automatic role assignment
**add to user** - assign roles to users
hub.footer: select an operation from the menu below

setup.started: embed setup started in {channel}! let's create something pretty!
setup.getStarted: click the button below to get started!
setup.noResponse: no response received. embed setup cancelled.
setup.empty: you can't send an empty embed! please add some content.
setup.addFields: please add fields using the buttons below. click "done" when you are ready!
setup.noFields: there are no fields to remove!
setup.cannotSend: i can't send embeds in that channel! please choose another one.
